## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 40,000 units (2 x 20,000 units)             |
| Rationale                         | Utilizing the current stock and ordering multiple vendor units achieves the target stock level while respecting vendor order quantity constraints. It minimizes excess stock without compromising on meeting demand, achieving the ideal balance between availability and cost. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | The recommended order is significantly lower than the player's planned order of 150,000 units. It considers the actual forecasted demand and existing stock level, thus avoiding overstocking. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 5.5 days (assuming constant daily sales) |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5 days (covering forecasted demand for the next 5 days) |
| Comments                          | This strategy ensures sufficient stock for the next 5 days, considering the lead time and potential demand variations. Ordering in increments allows for flexibility to adjust future orders based on actual sales data. |
